kDesc
Rev your engine and get ready to hit the snowdrifts on your very own Polar Rush snowmobile from Lockwood. ※By equipping this item, your movement speed will be increased. [#Legal]
Faites vrombir votre moteur et lancez-vous sur la neige bien fraiche aux commandes de votre propre motoneige Polar Rush de Lockwood. ※Appuyez sur Carré pour accélérer. [#Legal]
Lass den Motor aufheulen und erkunde mit deinem eigenen Polar-Rush-Schneemobil von Lockwood die weiße Welt. ※Drücke die Quadrat-Taste für einen Geschwindigkeitsschub. [#Legal]
Avvia il motore e preparati ad aggredire la neve sul tuo personalissimo gatto delle nevi Polar Rush di Lockwood. ※Premi Quadrato per un bonus d velocità. [#Legal]
Revisa el motor y prepárate para escalar montones de nueve con tu propia motonieve Polar Rush de Lockwood. ※Presiona Cuadro para aumentar la velocidad. [#Legal]
Rev your engine and get ready to hit the snowdrifts on your very own Polar Rush snowmobile from Lockwood. ※By equipping this item, your movement speed will be increased. [#Legal]
